title: [Massive] Mastering Smartphone-Based MOOC Design and Assignment Management

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Digital Literacy and Language Teaching Experience
context.additional_context: Strengthening MOOC design capabilities optimized for microlearning environments using only smartphones, targeting managers/leaders.

learning_goals: Learners can design a 10-module strategy suitable for mobile learning environments.
Learners can develop three or more types of smartphone-based interactive tasks.
Learners can complete an instructional design for a 6-month long-term course within a limited timeframe.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
